properties.areaDesc: Pamlico and Pungo Rivers; Neuse and Bay Rivers
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 5 at 2:47AM EST until February 7 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 kt with frequent gusts up to 40 kt
and very rough waters possible.

* WHERE...Pamlico, Pungo, Neuse, and Bay Rivers.

* WHEN...Late Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
